About Pragmatic

Pragmatic is a simple, well-designed and customizable Jekyll theme that you can use for free! Just fork this Github repository and you’ll be all ready to start your website.

This theme if full of powerful features you can use:

Responsive Design

Pragmatic adapts to the layout and works on mobile, computer and tablet.

Projects and posts layouts

All you need to do is add your posts and projects files, and they will be showcased in a well thought-out and appealing manner.

Clear documentation

The project documentation is simple and guides you every step of the way. You can also find more detailed tutorials on my blog.

Built in social media buttons

Our social media icons will make it easier to link to your online presence.

SEO friendly

We’ve optimized your website for higher rankings on search engines like google.

Disqus comments

WEe provide integration with the commenting service platform Disqus,although if your site is oriented towards tech, the opensource toolGitalk is recommended.

Google Analytics

Our theme’s structure provides easy setup of Google Analytics.

You can use the template for commercial or personal projects and you can hire me if you need extra support.
